nodes.text: Starhawk Command was a New Republic Defense Fleet command unit active in the Battle of Jakku in 5 ABY during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the New Republic, the successor state of the Alliance to Restore the Republic. During the battle, Commander Iden Versio of Inferno Squad contacted Starhawk Command to request orbital strikes on Imperial walkers that were advancing on her position as she attempted to assist Captain Lindsey and his unit. The Starhawk-class battleship Unity responded to Versio's call for assistance and launched multiple orbital strikes, successfully destroying the walkers.
